name: Whack-a-Mole (Penzy)
description:
This game is made for Trijam #210
Made in 3 hours :D

Softwares I used:
Godot Engine 3.5
Inkscape

How to play:
Left click on the red moles to get points.
Avoid clicking on the green moles
Get as many points before the timer runs out
The size of the rectangle at the bottom indicates how much time is left

Try to beat my best score. 300.
